links.title: AAPL pushes through prior session high
links.description: Highlights Report Sentiment: 40% Bullish Overview Moving higher for the 2nd day in a row, AAPL finished Tuesday at 193.00 gaining $1.39 (0.73%). Today's closing price of 193.00 marks the highest close since June 7th. Closing above Monday's high at 191.96, the stock confirms its breakout through the prior session's high having traded $1.70 above it intraday.
